mapper.select: SELECT userid, password, authority FROM member WHERE id=#{userid}

select m.*, f.uid1 as uid2, f.uid2 as uid1, f.status as relation from (select * from member where username LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchTerm},'%')) m left join follow f on ((userid=uid1 and uid2=#{userid}) or (userid=uid2 and uid1=#{userid}))
mapper.insert: insert into MEMBER values (#{userid}, #{username}, #{password}, 'USER', #{email}, null, null, 'default_profile.png', 'default_profile.png', 1, now(), now())
mapper.update: update member set username=#{username}, password=#{password}, email=#{email}, modified=now(), profile_image=#{profile_image}, tel=#{tel}, birth=#{birth} where userid=#{userid}
update member set profile_image=#{url} where userid=#{userid}
update member set cover_image=#{url} where userid=#{userid}
